remarks: Move LHS left multiplication to RHS. (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 15-Oct-2018.)
statement:
mvllmuld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
mvllmuld.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
mvllmuld.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= 0 ) $.
mvllmuld.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( A x. B ) = C ) $.
mvllmuld $p |- ( ph -> B = ( C / A ) ) $.
